EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Email sent when Risk Assessment Report is Submitted
EmailTemplate.name: Risk Assessment Report Submitted
EmailTemplate.subject: Notification: Risk Assessment Report '{!RiskAssessment__c.Name}' Submitted for Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
This email is to notify you that Risk Assessment Report {!RiskAssessment__c.Name} has been submitted and is ready for your review.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
